info.description: A comprehensive service management platform with subscription-based billing, user management, and server administration. Features include OAuth2 authentication, traffic subscription management, multi-gateway payments, referral programs, and customer support system.
info.title: Linke API

get.description: Get active payment configurations for public display. Returns simplified method-based configs
Get available payment methods organized by gateway. Returns enabled payment gateways and their supported methods (epay: alipay, wechat, qqpay). No authentication required.

200.description: Returns map of gateway to supported payment methods

500.description: Failed to retrieve payment methods from database

post.description: Handle payment notification callbacks from payment gateways. Supports epay gateway with MD5 signature verification and anti-replay protection. Updates payment status and triggers subscription activation on successful payment.

400.description: fail" "Invalid gateway, signature verification failed, or malformed request

500.description: fail" "Internal processing error or database failure

post.description: Create a new payment order for invoice or subscription. Supports epay gateway with Alipay, WeChat Pay, and QQ Pay. Includes anti-replay protection and secure payment URL generation. Either invoice_id or subscription_order_id must be provided.

parameters.description: Payment order data with gateway (epay), method (alipay/wechat/qqpay), amount, and either invoice_id or subscription_order_id
parameters.name: payment_order

201.description: Returns payment record with payment URL, QR code, and expiration time

400.description: Invalid request data, unsupported payment method, or missing required fields

422.description: Amount outside valid range or gateway configuration error

500.description: Payment gateway error or database failure
